thread.title: Brees, Watson help Saints stun Falcons, 31-21
thread.title_full: Brees, Watson help Saints stun Falcons, 31-21

title: Brees, Watson help Saints stun Falcons, 31-21
text:
> Georgia Brees, Watson help Saints stun Falcons, 31-21 New Orleans Saints head coach Sean Payton speaks to New Orleans Saints quarterback Drew Brees (9) during the first half of an NFL football game against the Atlanta Falcons, Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015, in New Orleans. (AP Photo/Gerald Herbert)
